Posts.Content: I agree always have the mammograms , that is how I found out I have stage 1 , my sister never had hers and y the time she went hers was stage 4 and had gone to her brain. I wish she was here today
Posts.Title: Good news, but still have questions.

Posts.Content: Joan,  thanks for the info, I  just  don't want to have more surgery, 2 times is enough.  My daughter says the same, it might not be as bad this time, and besides any breast that is left would be better then none. Thank you
Posts.Title: need to talk

Posts.Content: I found out May that I have breast cancer, my husband passed away in March of head and neck cancer after a 2 yr battle, just before thay my sister passed from breast cancer . I was wondering if I should just have them take the whole breast, I;m 63
Posts.Title: need to talk

Posts.Content: springflower,  Thank you, I have never heard of Laser Surgery, but I'm to have my 2nd surgery on Friday. no more nodes have to be removed, they have already took 1/4 of my breast so I guess a little more won't hurt. I guess that since I went through 3 yrs of caregiving with David I don't have many fears.thank you for your insite. Good luck to  you I hope all goes well
Posts.Title: need to talk
